quote: Some people have lives; some people have music.
author: John Green,  Will Grayson, Will Grayson

quote: Music is my higher power
author: Oliver James

quote: Music is the beat of a drum that keeps time with our emotions.
author: Shannon L. Alder

quote: Where words leave off, music begins.
author: Heinrich Heine

quote: Music is an outburst of the soul.
author: Frederick Delius

quote: The earth has music for those who listen.
author: George Santayana

quote: Music is the social act of communication among people, a gesture of friendship, the strongest there is.
author: Malcolm Arnold

quote: My music is the spiritual expression of what I am — my faith, my knowledge, my being...When you begin to see the possibilities of music, you desire to do something really good for people, to help humanity free itself from its hangups...I want to speak to their souls.
author: John Coltrane

quote: Music is the mediator between the spiritual and the sensual life.
author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: Music, my rampart and my only one.
author: Edna St. Vincent Millay

quote: The only truth is music.
author: Jack Kerouac

quote: Music is as integral to me as my own DNA. My life has become a continual soundtrack, with music underscoring the most powerful and even the most banal moments of my life.
author: Danielle de Niese

quote: Music is everywhere. It’s in the air between us, waiting to be sung.
author: David Levithan,  How They Met, and Other Stories

quote: Music is the universal language of mankind.
author: Henry Wadsworth Longfellow

quote: Music is, to me, proof of the existence of God. It is so extraordinarily full of magic, and in tough times of my life I can listen to music and it makes such a difference.
author: Kurt Vonnegut

quote: Music is the language of the universe. Music was there even before the concept of life. Music is one of the most powerful catalysts of evolution.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Music has the power to bring people together like no other art form.
author: Michael Franti

quote: Music is God's gift to man, the only art of Heaven given to earth, the only art of earth we take to Heaven.
author: Walter Savage Landor

quote: Music is a moral law. It gives soul to the universe, wings to the mind, flight to the imagination, and charm and gaiety to life and to everything.
author: Plato

quote: Music melts all the separate parts of our bodies together.
author: Anaïs Nin

quote: If music be the food of love, play on.
author: William Shakespeare,  Twelfth Night

quote: If music be the food of love, play on.
author: William Shakespeare

quote: Life seems to go on without effort when I am filled with music.
author: George Eliot,  The Mill on the Floss

quote: People haven't always been there for me but music always has.
author: Taylor Swift

quote: LOVE is a friendship set to music
author: E. Joseph Cossman

quote: Music is ... A higher revelation than all Wisdom & Philosophy
author: Ludwig van Beethoven

quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche,  Twilight of the Idols

quote: Without music, life would be a mistake.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: Music is the primordial language of life. That is why we love it so much. Actually every animal can hear and understand music better than we do.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Music is love, love is music, music is life, and I love my life. Thank you and good night.
author: A. J. McLean

quote: Music is the language of the heart. It can only sing songs of love.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Just enjoy the music of life.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: Inside, I've got a real purist desire and dream about the music. I like the idea of being able to carve out a kind of magical, colourful, artistic, inspirational life. And the reality just turns out to be quite different, working with the business to bring this thing you have created into the world.
author: Damien Rice

quote: Music happens to be an art form that transcends language.
author: Herbie Hancock

quote: Love is a friendship set to music.
author: Joseph Campbell

quote: Without music, life would be a blank to me.
author: Jane Austen,  Emma

quote: Some songs you get. Some songs you may not. And I think that's the beauty of art: to question and to ask, to understand the deeper meaning after two or three or four listenings.
author: Janelle Monae

quote: Music is one of the noblest callings I can think of. It's the highest of all the art forms to me. For example, if my kid said to me, 'I want to give it all up,' whatever it is that they're doing, 'and I want to take my saxophone and go out,' I would say, 'May God go with you. This is a great and noble thing that you're doing.'
author: Hugh Laurie

quote: Philosophy is the highest music.
author: Plato

quote: Music fills the void between the heart and soul and connects them in heavenly delights.
author: Debasish Mridha

quote: I need drama in my life to keep making music.
author: Eminem

quote: It was the moment I realized what music can do to people, how it can make you hurt and feel so good all at once.
author: Nina LaCour,  Hold Still

quote: Dance music is my love, is my passion, is my life. I live for my fans and take my art very seriously.
author: Steve Aoki

quote: Such sweet compulsion doth in music lie.
author: John Milton,  The Complete Poetry

quote: For a long time, music was hope. Now it seems music isn't enough to make me happy. It used to be that's all I needed to keep going. Now I need other things to take up the other parts of my life.
author: Juliana Hatfield

quote: Music is an agreeable harmony for the honor of God and the permissible delights of the soul.
author: Johann Sebastian Bach

quote: when somebody plays music, you listen. you just follow those sounds, and eventually you understand the music. the point can't be explained in words because music is not words, but after listening for a while, you understand the point of it, and that point is the music itself. in exactly the same way, you can listen to all experiences.
author: Alan W. Watts,  Still the Mind: An Introduction to Meditation

quote: If music be the food of love, play on,Give me excess of it; that surfeiting,The appetite may sicken, and so die.
author: William Shakespeare,  Twelfth Night

quote: My goal is to be one with the music. I just dedicate my whole life to this art.
author: Jimi Hendrix

quote: I think music is what language once aspired to be. Music allows us to face God on our own terms because it reaches beyond life.
author: Simon Van Booy
